name: Battle Maze
description:
A maze can be a puzzling challenge but when you have an army of evil trying to slow you down you will be forced to think quickly in order to save your towns King!

-Use the arrow keys and the enter key to play or use your mouse buttons for hyper fast gameplay! 
-We plan to add more mazes and more content updates in the future so be sure to follow/fan us and check back later for new updates!

Destroy enemies while completing mazes in a quest to rescue your towns king but don't worry your not alone, It's a simple yet fun game combining RPG style combat and gameplay along with challenging mazes.

We appreciate your feedback! Please keep in mind this game was made by a very small team! We will take your feedback seriously to improve games current and future! Thank you!
